turkish_example_sentence: O pahalı yeşil saati istememişolsa, satın almazdı.
english_example_sentence: If she had not wanted that expensive green watch, she would not have bought it.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не хотела то дорогие зеленые часы, она бы их не купила.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O pahalı yeşil saati ______, satın almazdı.
